summary: Completed comprehensive testing of email functionality for Add Power Electrics chatbot demo. All core email features are working correctly including auto-send confirmation emails, manual quote emails, and email logging.

design_issues.issue: Minor console warnings about HTML structure (span inside tbody)

passed_tests: Lead capture auto-sends confirmation email with email_sent flag set to true
Quote button in admin dashboard opens email preview modal correctly
Send Quote Email button in modal sends mocked quote email successfully
Email logs endpoint returns sent emails list (10 emails found)
Email preview endpoint returns both confirmation and quote templates with proper structure
Frontend chat lead capture flow works end-to-end with email confirmation
Admin dashboard displays email confirmation indicators (âœ“) for sent emails
All existing chatbot functionality remains intact (FAQ, lead capture, validation)
